content: mosaic christmas cal part 10 written pattern further in the written pattern single_crochet=blsc into next st except 1st and last sts on each r and r1 first st is always stsc the last one single_crochet number in front identifies how many sts you have to work r1 are all single_crochet sts except the 1st one stsc double_crochet= fldc 2 rs below number in front identifies how many sts you have to work … x n the number of repeats is identified as x n where n is any number of repeats the number of repeats depends on how many multiples of 48 your foundation cord is … repeated part of this design 24x2 … repeated part of the specific part of the pattern within the main repeat repeat part of the pattern number of times identified *…* x 8 repeated group of the stitches within the main repeat repeat part of the pattern number of times identified each r has the same number of sts the number stitches depends on how many multiples of 48 your foundation cord is e g 2x48+3=99 3x48+3=147 4x48+3=195 etc row 1 color a if this is not the first part of your project skip this row and continue your project with r2 if for this part you use a different background color work this row replacing single_crochet with back loop single_crochet in your new background color 1sc into each chain across row 2 color b stsc 48sc x n 2sc row 3 color a stsc 12sc 1dc 11sc x 2 x n 2sc row 4 color b stsc 1dc 23sc x 2 x n 1dc 1sc row 5 color a stsc 9sc 7dc 8sc x 2 x n 2sc row 6 color b stsc *1dc 7sc* x 3 x 2 x n 1dc 1sc row 7 color a stsc 1sc 1dc 5sc 1dc *1sc 3dc* x 2 1sc 1dc 5sc 1dc x 2 x n 2sc row 8 color b stsc 1dc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 1sc 1dc 7sc 1dc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 1sc x 2 x n 1dc 1sc row 9 color a stsc *1sc 1dc* x 2 3sc 1dc *1sc 3dc* x 2 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 1sc 1dc x 2 x n 2sc row 10 color b stsc 1dc 1sc 1dc 5sc 1dc 7sc 1dc 5sc 1dc 1sc x 2 x n 1dc 1sc row 11 color a stsc 1sc 1dc 7sc *1dc 1sc* x 3 1dc 7sc 1dc x 2 x n 2sc row 12 color b stsc *1dc 11sc* x 2 x 2 x n 1dc 1sc row 13 color a stsc 7sc 3dc 5sc 3dc 6sc x 2 x n 2sc row 14 color b stsc *1dc 5sc* x 4 x 2 x n 1dc 1sc row 15 color a stsc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 1sc 3dc *1sc 1dc* x 2 1sc 3dc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc x 2 x n 2sc row 16 color b stsc 1dc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 11sc 1dc 3sc 1dc 1sc
